index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services for financial assistance to develop additional high quality community child care capacity; increasing expenditure allowances in the 2000 and 2001 budgets of the Human Services Department by making reimbursable appropriations; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
